laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Viral load testing for Epstein-Barr virus (EBV)
laboratory_examinations.findings: EBV present in plasma with a load of 10,000 IU/mL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: High EBV load in plasma remains consistent between both patients.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Fluorescence-activated cell sorting for NK T cells
laboratory_examinations.findings: Reduced percentage of NK T cells (CD3+ TCR-Vα24+ and TCR-Vβ11+) in patients (<0.02%) compared to healthy controls (0.36% and 0.42%).
PHA-treated cells capable of expanding and forming colonies, no differences compared to control cells.
